channel.title: Fixing Ice Barrage
channel.description: Hey um.. I was trying to make Ice Barrage smaller but I eh... Kinda messed something up.. How do I make it smaller without messing anything up on the server itself..? Because before, I changed Ice Barrage but whenever you casted it on someone, it ONLY hit the player you casted it on, no-one else.. Would appreiate an answer fast! Thanks!!

item.title: Fixing Ice Barrage
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

Thanks you guys. I got it fixed and working correctly! You guys rock!

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing Ice Barrage
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

lol this is what i use…

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] > 94) { { sendMessage(""); } { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 39, 10); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 5; //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("u freeze the enemy"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 94) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

item.title: Fixing Ice Barrage
item.dc:creator: @Heroic Heroic
item.description:
@Heroic wrote:

Go to client.java

Find:

if(magicID == 12891)

Once found, replace the whole code with this one:

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= -124 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true)) { deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60); startAnimation(1979); attackNPCSWithin(369, 39, 0); //hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(67); server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); //stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }
Welcome

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing Ice Barrage
item.dc:creator: @r.v.d.p r.v.d.p
item.description:
@r.v.d.p wrote:

[code][code]search:

ice barr
then delete this: stillgfx(370EnemyY2, EnemyX2)
then put this on that line:

attackNPCSWithin(253, 5 4); attackPlayersWithin(253, 5 4); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
wanna make more gfx? add this (will lagg a little)

stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 +1, EnemyX2 +1); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 +1, EnemyX2); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2 +1); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 -1, EnemyX2 -1); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 -1, EnemyX2); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2 -1); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 +2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2 +2); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 +2, EnemyX2 +2); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 -2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2 -2); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 -2, EnemyX2 -2); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 +2, EnemyX2 -2); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 -2, EnemyX2 +2); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 +3, EnemyX2); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2 +3); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 +3, EnemyX2 +3); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 -3, EnemyX2); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2 -3); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 -3, EnemyX2 -3); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 +3, EnemyX2 -3); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 -3, EnemyX2 +3); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 +4, EnemyX2); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2 +4); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 +4, EnemyX2 +4); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 -4, EnemyX2); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2 -4); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 -4, EnemyX2 -4); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2 -4, EnemyX2 +4); [/code][/code]
